generate.title: Generate
generate.description: Generates dbt source and staging files, model property files and extracts metadata for tables (used as input for sources and properties)

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Parameters for the generate sources command

database.title: Database
database.description: Default database where the generate sources command will search for tables

schemas.title: Schemas
schemas.description: Default schemas where the generate sources command will search for tables

select-relations.title: Select relations
select-relations.description: List of relations to include when searching source tables

exclude-relations.title: Exclude relations
exclude-relations.description: List of relations to exclude when searching source tables

sources_destination.title: Sources destination
sources_destination.description: Default location and file name where source yml files will be generated.

models_destination.title: Models destination
models_destination.description: Default location and file name where staging model(sql) files will be generated.

model_props_destination.title: Model properties destination
model_props_destination.description: Default location and file name where staging property(yml) files will be generated.

update_strategy.title: Update strategy
update_strategy.description: Action to perform when a generated file already exists. Options: update, recreate, fail, ask

templates_folder.title: Templates folder
templates_folder.description: Folder where dbt-coves will look for jinja templates (source_props.yml, staging_model_props.yml, staging_model.sql) that override default dbt-coves file generation templates.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Default file to find metadata file used to fill in field descriptions

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: Default location and file name where model yml files will be generated. You can specify a specific path by declaring it explicitly, i.e.: "models/staging/{{model_file_name}}.yml" or "{{model_folder_path}}/{{model_file_name}}.yml"
